title: X Factor's Amelia Lily gets in boozy row with Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry
text:
Things go heated between the two (Picture: REX)

Former X Factor star Amelia Lily got into a rather explosive argument with Geordie Shore‘s Chloe Ferry after the cast enjoyed a night out in Newcastle.

A heated exchange was made between the duo as they were leaving Powerhouse nightclub.

The Sun claimed the row began when 25-year-old Amelia was asked to jump in the back of the minibus, which clearly upset Chloe as the 24-year-old started yelling at her.

Chloe was sat in the back with pals Bethan and Natalie at the time and refused to open the door to Amelia.

Geordie Shore bosses had to break the argument up and Chloe forced Amelia to sit in the front seat.

The reality star was then spotted shouting at the singer while she kept her head in her hands.

Chloe got angry (Picture: Mark R Milan/REX)

The night before the crew were seen arguing as they left Mono Club.

Chloe was reportedly all smiles when she left the Newcastle nightclub but her mood soon changed.

The star was spotted shouting and seething before appearing to go into a rage, with producers having to split up some of the cast to try to calm the situation down.

It is unclear what upset Chloe at the time.

Reps for Chloe Ferry and Amelia Lily have been approached for a comment.

The cast is currently filming season 21 of Geordie Shore.

MTV dropped a new clip offering a sneak peek at season 20 of the hit-show, including the return of original castmate, James.

‘Once a Geordie, always a Geordie. Get me back in the house,’ James says in the trailer, before seeing the excited faces of his season 20 castmates.

Nathan then admitted: ‘James is the last person on this Earth I thought would walk through the door. But I’m so glad there’s an original back in the building.’

Season 20 of Geordie Shore starts Tuesday at 10pm on MTV.
